title: THE PULSE  (Sci-Fi Loops)
description: WAS $24.99 NOW ONLY $15.00 ! The Pulse offers a side chain pumped 10 mega bass/synth crunching music asset cues ready for placement in your production.
longDescription:
WELCOME TO THE PULSE

This brand new product of 10 High Quality Loops from Cerberus Audio is made with the latest and most high quality Percussion & Industry Standard Pulse Synths from the Industry. The pack has been crafted for menu style music & in-game level music, screen titles/background music for your Unreal Project.


Percussion Features:

All Percussion in this asset pack was recorded (sampled ) at Skywalker Sound Studio in California.


What can the music be used for?

( All of the following tracks are great for title screen style music, loading screens, character customisation & menu listings ) edit the music however you like to best fit your game.


LISTEN HERE : https://soundcloud.com/jordan-caygill/the-pulse-preview-unreal-marketplace/s-MWm996MJpAF


( IMPORTANT NOTICE ) Unfortunately for some reason we cannot reply to comments & questions left on our products pages. Please do continue to leave reviews, we appreciate the support from our existing & new customers.


Please email us directly at Cerberus_Audio@outlook.com for product help, questions & any other enquiries.


Thank you.


C Audio
technicalDetails:
Features:

  •  10 Audio Cues/Wav
  •  High Quality Pulsing Synth Loops
  •  Modern Percussion Drums, recorded (sampled ) at Skywalker Sound Studio in California.
  • Not Available in (MP3) Unreal Engine Store Asset ONLY ( No other File Format download other than what is provided by the Unreal Store. ( See Audio Specs below )

Number of Audio Wavs: 10

Number of Audio Cues: 10

Sample rate / bit rate: 44,100 Hz / 16 BIT

Does music loop: Yes

Minutes of audio provided: 22 minutes

Supported Development Platforms: All

Windows: Yes

Mac: Yes
